TaskDescription.Detail: Create and control multiple browsers with two ChromeOpens.

Assist.value: Launch the Chrome browser and go to the Google page.
Enter the variable 'this.googlebrowser' to store the browser that displays the Google page.
Enter 'https://www.google.com/?hl=en'.
Create a browser and go to the Google page.
Launch the chrome browser and go to the bing page.
Enter the variable 'this.bingbrowser' to store the browser that displays the bing page.
Enter 'https://www.bing.com/?setlang=en'.
Create a browser and go to the bing page.
On the bing page, enter 'samsung' in the search field and search.
Specify a search box on the bing page.
Enter the text to be entered, 'samsung'.
Activate it to type enter after entering a search term.
Enter a search term and type enter .
Enter 'samsung' in the search field on the Google page and search.
Enter 'this.googlebrowser' to target Google Pages. In the case of LATEST_BROWSER , it means the bing page, which is the page you previously controlled.
Specify the search field on the Google page.
Enter the text to be entered, 'samsung'.
Activate it to type enter after entering a search term.
Enter a search term and type enter .
Enter 'samsung sds' in the search field on the Google page and search.
Enter 'this.googlebrowser' to target Google Pages, or keep 'LATEST_BROWSER' to mean Google Pages, which is a previously controlled page.
Specify the search field on the Google page.
Enter the text to be entered, 'samsung sds'.
Activate it to type enter after entering a search term.
Enter a search term and type enter .
On the bing page, enter 'samsung sds' in the search field and search.
Enter 'this.bingbrowser' to target the bing page.
Specify a search box on the bing page.
Enter the text to be entered, 'samsung sds'.
Activate it to type enter after entering a search term.
Enter a search term and type enter .
Click the samsung sds item that came up as a search result on the Google page.
Enter 'this.googlebrowser' to target Google Pages.
Specifies the samsung sds item in the search results on the Google page.
Click the samsung sds item in the search results.
On the bing page, click the samsung sds item that came up as a search result.
Enter 'this.bingbrowser' to target the bing page.
Specifies the samsung sds item in the search results on the bing page.
Click the samsung sds item in the search results.
Exit the bing page.
Enter 'LATEST_BROWSER' or 'this.bingbrowser' to target the bing page you just controlled.
Quit the browser with the bing page.
Close the Google page.
Enter 'LATEST_BROWSER' or 'this.googlebrowser' to target the previously controlled Google page because the previously controlled bing page was terminated.
Quit the browser with the bing page.
